name: TweetButton
author: DCGWS Internet Solutions

sections.description:
Easily allows your blog post or page to be retweeted. Currently being used by SocialBrite and other members of the social media community.

Features

  • Allows you to change the source which you retweet, e.g. ” via @yourname”

  • Easily installation and customization

  • Better integration, allowing custom titles, related accounts

  • Integrates with WordPress MU

Help

Please contact at us http://dcgws.com/contact/ for any questions
sections.installation:
Follow the steps below to install the plugin.

  1. Upload the TweetButton directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to TweetButton->Settings to configure the button
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added support for the simple widget without Tweet count

1.0.2

  • Fixed a bug with related accounts

1.0.3

  • Fixed a bug with RSS Feeds

1.1

  • Improvements to TweetButton->Settings page

1.1.1

  • Improvements to Twitter’s Recommended Accounts function

1.1.2

  • Improved Tweet widget in RSS Feed

1.1.3

  • Better explanation on Related Accounts

1.1.4

  • Fixed path for Tweet widget image in 3rd party feeds

1.2

  • Introduced support for changing language of Tweet Button

= 1.2.1

  • Fixed minor bug with way Google Reader was rendering widget in the interface.

2.0.0 Updated plugin to be compatible with twitter visual refresh. Added #hashtag support

3.0.0 Ensure compatibility with WordPress 4.0

3.1.0

  • Ensure compatibility with WordPress 4.5.2
  • Removed Tweet count
  • Added Official Twitter menu icon
